attributes.action: immediately instigate a criminal investigation of MP's expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is an ample body of evidence to determine if criminal law has been broken regarding the expense and allowance claims and payments of a growing number of Members of Parliament. 

To see justice done, the matter should be immediately referred to the Police for investigation.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
